text:
="preserve">The 2020 OFC Nations Cup will be the 11th edition of the OFC Nations Cup, the international men's football championship of Oceania organised by the Oceania Football Confederation (OFC) that happens once every four years.
New Zealand are the defending champions.
Qualification[edit].
All 11 FIFA-affiliated national teams from OFC are eligible to enter. A qualification round may be held for the lowest-ranked teams before the final tournament.
